pages.title: History of the Internet in the Netherlands
pages.description: Learn about how the Netherlands became the second country in the world to connect to the internet.

pages.title: Python for beginners
pages.description: Learn about the basics of Python programming for beginners, including what Python is, its key features, and how to get started with coding.

pages.title: Coding best practices
pages.description: Developers use best practices to create efficient, readable, and maintainable code, much like the Netherlands was among the first to connect to the internet.

pages.title: Calculus refresher
pages.description: Master calculus fundamentals quickly, like early internet pioneers boosting connectivity.

pages.title: Security protocols
pages.description: Security protocols protect data and enable safe digital interactions, just as early internet connections laid the groundwork for connectivity.

pages.title: Colour wheel
pages.description: Discover the history and significance of the colour wheel, including its development and how it is used in art and design today.

pages.title: Virtual reality
pages.description: Explore the evolution, milestones, and future of Virtual Reality technology globally.

pages.title: Math in programming
pages.description: Discover how math underpins modern programming, from algorithms and data structures to machine learning and AI.

pages.title: Internet network
pages.description: Discover how global internet networks are interconnected and the evolution of internet infrastructure around the world.
